question:
You live near a public school. The school asked local residents to help maintain the school building and playground. Write a letter to the principal. In your letter:
    * Explain why you would like to help
    * Tell them how you can help
    * Let them know when you are available
text: I, Kuljeet Kaur, residing at 432, XYZ locality nearby the school. I am writing this letter in connection with the voluntary activities in order to maintain the building and playground.

Firstly, I want you to know that I am pursuing a special course in gardening. Hence, I am having this unique skill which can help to attain the goals of the institution. I would like to help the institute in the proper maintenance of gardens and plants.
Additionally, I can also provide assistance in the process of renovation. I want to help the faculty because I am an avid social worker too. Thus, I am having a keen interest in volunteerism.

However, I am unable to provide my service in the morning hours due to my classes at that time. But, I am available after 3 o'clock in the evening. Therefore, it would be really commendable if you could permit me to help the school during the aforesaid times.
Looking forward to hearing a positive and speedy reply on this.
